abstract: Unidentified 11-year-old Detroit boy is charged with manslaughter in fatal shooting of 3-year-old child.
lead_paragraph: The shooting, which took place Monday on the east side of Detroit, was the first such case that the Wayne County prosecutor could recall involving a person so young.

headline.main: Detroit Boy, 11, Charged With Manslaughter in Shooting of 3-Year-Old
headline.print_headline: 11-Year-Old Held in Detroit in Fatal Shooting of Boy, 3

snippet: The shooting, which took place Monday on the east side of Detroit, was the first such case that the Wayne County prosecutor could recall involving a person so young.
